title: Advanced Purchase Rate
seo_title: Advanced Purchase Rate | Deals at The Frederick Hotel
excerpt: One of our best rates available, get up to 20% off when you book our Advanced Purchase Rate 14 days in advance at our Tribeca boutique hotel
description:
One of our best rates available, get up to 30% off when you book our Advanced Purchase Rate 30-days in advance at our Tribeca boutique hotel. Mingle at our speakeasy-style bar and sleep easy in our stylish accommodations knowing you got the hook-up at The Frederick.

Enjoy our signature amenities:

  • Complimentary Wi-Fi throughout the hotel
  • Frette linens
  • In-room safes
  • Alarm clock
  • Concierge services
  • Valet parking
  • Valet laundry
  • 24-hour fitness room
  • C.O. Bigelow bath amenities
  • Pay per view
  • HD Channels
  • Complimentary New York Times newspapers
  • Serafina, Starbucks and Pret A Manger on premises
addon: Book this package and youâ€™ll also receive a $25 American Express Card for each night you stay with us, up to $200.
